name: Galarian Ponyta

evolution.description: Galarian Ponyta can evolve into Galarian Rapidash at level 10 and above. When it evolves, its health increases by double its level, and it gains 12 points to add to its ability scores (max 20).

description: The Unique Horn Pokémon. Its small horn hides a healing power. With a few rubs from this Pokémon's horn, any slight wound you have will be healed.

abilities.name: Run Away
abilities.description: This Pokémon cannot be the target of an attack of opportunity.

abilities.name: Pastel Veil
abilities.description: This Pokémon and its allies cannot be poisoned for as long as it is in combat.

abilities.name: Anticipation
abilities.description: When this Pokémon enters the battle, an opponent must reveal if it has a move that the Pokémon is vulnerable to. The move itself does not have to be revealed, only that there is such a move.
